title: Beautiful Ocean Views14271 Hwy 101N, Smith River, CAEscape
text:
Beautiful Ocean Views14271 Hwy 101N, Smith River, CAEscape ad date: 10/07/2015 
Beautiful Ocean Views14271 Hwy 101N, Smith River, CAEscape to your beach house on the Wild Rivers Coast. Experience a rural atmosphere where an unhurried lifestyle is second to none. Public access just across highway to beaches. 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bath downstairs and a spiral staircase takes you to a spacious loft bedroom, office or den. Some of the features include new gridded vinyl windows, fireplace with insert, tile & hardwood flooring, French doors, 3 ductless heat-pumps and more. 1.28 acres. No. 1500278 $328,000Donna Zorn, AgentMing Tree Real Estate1000 Northcrest Dr., Crescent City707-951-0857 or 464-9741, #01221233
